problem_text:
Let F be an infinite field or a skew-field.
a) Find all transitive subgroups of PGL(2, F) acting on the projective line F∪{∞}.
c) What are the flag-transitive subgroups of PGL(d + 1, F)?
d) What subgroups of PGL(d + 1, F) are 2-transitive on the points of PG(d, F)?
P. M. Neumann, C. E. Praeger
